message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling. However, based on my research and budget, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $10000 to $12000. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12500. This is a fair price considering the product's value and the effort I've put into it. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
